org.lab99.mdt.drawable

Class MessengerDrawable

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.graphics.drawable.Drawable
      • org.lab99.mdt.drawable.MessengerDrawable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback

    public class MessengerDrawable
extends android.graphics.drawable.Drawable
    A special Drawable for passing the touch event to the wrapped Drawable, as a messenger.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class android.graphics.drawable.Drawable
